mapper.insert: INSERT INTO discussion_table(user, time, title, content, course) VALUES(#{user}, #{time}, #{title}, #{content}, #{course})
mapper.select: SELECT d.id as id, u.id as user_id, u.name as user_name, d.time as time, d.title as title, d.content as content, d.reply_count as reply_count FROM user_table u,discussion_table d WHERE d.course=#{course_id}

SELECT d.id as id, u.id as user_id, u.name as user_name, d.time as time, d.title as title, d.content as content, d.reply_count as reply_count FROM user_table u,discussion_table d WHERE d.course=#{course_id} and d.title LIKE "%"#{title}"%"
